name: Journey Down
description:
Gameplay

Journey Down is a fantasy role-playing game. Make your way into the forest and as you go deeper into the forest, fight monsters via menu based combat, and earn loot as you suit up your character from the rewards of battle. Keep fighting until you can no longer fight. 

Equippable Items

The player will have unique items with varying stats such as attack, magic and speed. These items consist of:

  • Sword
  • Shield
  • Boots
  • Armor
  • Gloves
  • Helmet
  • Pants
  • Rings

Team Members
